measure: meldepflicht for events smaller than 1000 persons
at risk groups invited to be careful
official BAG flyers must be affixed at entrance of all events
civil protection only calls non-medical personell
at risk groups should avoid several activties (childcare, public transport, events)
closure of public places of entertainment and leisure
restaurants and hotels can only host less than 50 persons
people invited to stay home unless necessary
all other economic activities reduced to the minimum
all economic and commercial activities closed
ban on all public and private events
